structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Arrest Without Warrant; Endorsement Of Complaint By Arresting Officer
law.text: Said courts may dispense with the issuing of a warrant if the person charged with a crime has been arrested without a warrant and brought before the court or admitted to bail; but in such case the officer making the arrest shall endorse upon the complaint a statement of his doings.
